Less Oil in Storage. Mr. Guggenheim on Dividends. Consolidation at Hand. Sinking Fund Redemptions. Selling Utility Shares. Foreign Bonds Rally.

docs.snippet: After three years in which gold received here resulted in our holdings touching a new high mark, a sudden reversal set in about the middle of September, following the suspension of the gold standard in Great Britain and, because of record increases...
docs.lead_paragraph: After three years in which gold received here resulted in our holdings touching a new high mark, a sudden reversal set in about the middle of September, following the suspension of the gold standard in Great Britain and, because of record increases in earmarked metal, changed the balance for the month against the United States.

headline.main: OUR GOLD HOLDINGS DOWN IN SEPTEMBER; Total Earmarked for Foreign Account Rose $276,892,000 to $353,992,135. EXPORTS WERE $23,669,800 Large Shipments to France and Holland--Imports in Month Totaled $42,156,500. Large Shipments to France. Shipments in Nine Months.

docs.snippet: Mrs. Carrie Chapman Catt, who led the women of America in the fight for political equality with men, declared yesterday that the granting of voting privileges to the women of Spain marked the turn of Latin nations to a new evaluation of women.

docs.abstract: Hails granting of suffrage to Spanish women

headline.main: SUFFRAGE IN SPAIN HAILED BY MRS. CATT; Pioneer Here in Fight for Vote for Women Sees Extension of Franchise in Latin Lands. LOOKS TO SOUTH AMERICA She Expects the Liberal Attitude of Uruguay and Chile Will Spread In Western Hemisphere. Boon to Suffrage in France Seen.
